description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver Denial of Service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43540):

1. Identify and confirm your Windows version and build number from the list provided.
2. Download the respective KB update applicable to your system from the official Microsoft Update Catalog links below.
3. Install the update on your system following standard update procedures.
4. Restart your system to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates address issues related to improper input validation and out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities, which could be exploited to cause denial of service.
- Relevant KB Articles:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
- Ensure to back up critical data before installing updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Verify system compatibility based on build numbers.
- Administrative privileges are required for the installation.
